resources.string: Without this permission, HeadsetTurnOn will not be able to turn off the display!
Device admin permission not granted - HeadsetTurnOn will not be able to turn off your display. Click here to change
Turn your display on and off by pressing the media button on your headset.\nClick \'Start\' to make the app listening for media button events
The app acts as a foreground music player - media playback is not possible while the app is active!
